node.title: Testing Neon EVM with Robonomics Smart Contracts
node.description: The purpose of these tests were to validate the readiness of the Neon platform to move to the production stage using Robonomics smart contracts, which allow cyber-physical systems (robots) to make technical-economic transactions.

node.title: ROBONOMİKANIN 7 İL İNKİŞAFI VƏ 7 MİLYON XRT YANDIRILMASI
node.description: Robonimika üçün çox şey hələ qabaqdadır və ya ilk dəfədir ki, baş verir.

node.title: ROBONOMIKA və CRUST ŞƏBƏKƏLƏRİN STRATEJİ TƏRƏFDAŞLIĞI!
node.description: This partnership means there will be much deeper integration between the Crust and Robonomics parachains on Kusama, as well as an interesting new approach for cross-chain collaboration to simplify the user experience.
